TextLibrary.Text: Two-legs! I am glad I found you. The creatures returned, and they took two of our cubs. Is there any way you could help us again?
Two-legs! I am glad I found you. The creatures returned, and they took two of our cubs. Is there any way you could help us again?
Two-legs! I am glad I found you. The creatures returned, and they took two of our cubs. Is there any way you could help us again?
Two-legs! I am glad I found you. The creatures returned, and they took two of our cubs. Is there any way you could help us again?
Of course. Where have they taken them?
Of course. Where have they taken them?
Of course. Where have they taken them?
Of course. Where have they taken them?
There is an old place of worship up in the hills - an old Dragon Shrine. They have taken the cubs there. I fear they intend some harm.
There is an old place of worship up in the hills - an old Dragon Shrine. They have taken the cubs there. I fear they intend some harm.
There is an old place of worship up in the hills - an old Dragon Shrine. They have taken the cubs there. I fear they intend some harm.

Don't worry, Winter, I'll get the cubs back for you.
